name: Soulful (Nether Lamp)
description:
Soulful is an infinite runner game about a reaper girl who must run at high speeds and reap the souls in her path.

Dodge crates, skeletons and tumbstones!

But be carful! Reaping the soulless will damage your scythe, causing your soul to be hurt.

Otherwise, reaping the soulful will heal you.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Move
  • Z or L - Attack

This game was made for the "Mini Jam 92".
